content: NPR PR PP Pipe press ring Press rings for ProPress® profile press fittings from 2.5 to 4. Compatible with NPR 32-A pipe press tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Inserts for pressing, crimping & cutting ### FEATURES:Features Press rings for PP profile press fittings from 2.5 to 4 Engineered for superior reliability under demanding conditions Applications Pressing copper and stainless steel pipes from 2.5 to 4 * Press rings must be used with the respective press adapter. For more information, please see the instructions for use. *These values are system dependent. In order to ensure correct and safe pressing, consult the original instruction manual from the system supplier ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 3648727 - NPR 32 A ring and actuator set combo - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PA 5 pipe pressing Actuator jaws - 1x NPR PR/PA HNA Tool case assy - 1x NPR PR PP 2 1/2 Press ring - 1x NPR PR PP 3 Press ring - 1x NPR PR PP 4 Press ring - 2217396 - Press ring NPR PR PP 4 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PR PP 4 Press ring - 2217414 - Press ring NPR PR PP 3 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PR PP 3 Press ring - 2217413 - Press ring NPR PR PP 2 1/2 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PR PP 2 1/2 Press ring
